insert into product_sku_sales_info_draft (product_code, product_name, description, usage_status, spec, small_unit, sales_code, base_product_content, product_width, product_length, product_height, is_default, del_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, product_sku_code, product_sku_name,unit_code,zero_removal_coefficient) values
(#{item.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.smallUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.baseProductContent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productWidth,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.productLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.productHeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zeroRemovalCoefficient,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into product_sku_sales_info (apply_code, product_code, product_name, description, usage_status, spec, small_unit, sales_code, base_product_content, product_width, product_length, product_height, is_default, del_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, product_sku_code, product_sku_name ) values
(#{item.applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usageStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.smallUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.baseProductContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productWidth,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.productLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.productHeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
